```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)

library(dplyr)
library(snapdragon)
library(highcharter)
library(lubridate)
library(pins)
opts <- getOption("highcharter.lang")
opts$thousandsSep <- ","
options(highcharter.lang = opts)

## Global options
opts_chunk$set(
  # eval = FALSE, # uncomment this when first publishing to add credentials
  echo = TRUE,
  cache = FALSE,
  prompt = FALSE,
  tidy = FALSE,
  comment = NA,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
)
opts_knit$set(width=150)
```
